user_sentiment: Mixed - appreciative of the speed improvement but frustrated by a new/revealed bug affecting core functionality
execution_quality: Efficient execution with clean implementation, though the follow-up issue suggests the change may have introduced or exposed a bug in the group summary display logic.
work_category: Quick configuration fix to re-enable directory checking during startup after a performance optimization. Single-file edit based on user feedback.
summary: Agent quickly implemented the requested re-enablement of directory checking during startup with a single edit. The change was executed efficiently, but the subsequent user report of missing group summaries suggests the modification may have introduced a regression in data loading logic. While the immediate task was completed successfully, the follow-up issue indicates incomplete validation of the broader system impact.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a regression: unread item counts show on main view but empty summary when selecting groups. This indicates the prior edit may have broken group data loading or rendering, requiring investigation and debugging.
